title: A Dog Is Tearing Fortnite Apart - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.14.19
description:
Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://getquip.com/GAMES right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/kfgames

Gary and Greg gab about a bevy of THQ Nordic news and then get riled up about a Fortnite re-skin.

Time Stamps - 
00:09:51 - Housekeeping
We’re going to the Canadian National Exhibition in Toronto next week! August 16-18, Greg, Tim, and Andy will be hosting two panels a day in the Gaming Garage! kindafunny.com/events
The Roper Report   -
00:10:31 - THQ Nordic comments on TimeSplitters and Acquires Darksiders Dev Gunfire Games
00:14:09 - Dead Island 2 is on its 3rd Dev
00:19:10 - There’s a New Saints Row Coming
00:26:39 - Epic is Selling a reskinned dog and people are pissed
00:47:43 - Video Game Tariffs aren’t hitting the US JUST yet
00:50:53 - Borderlands 3 Tidbits
00:57:42 -  Quip
00:58:58 - Experian
01:00:20 - Out today
01:05:27 - Squad Up: Vince - Xbox One - Overlord342
01:06:15 - Required Reading - https://bit.ly/2PbKJPJ
01:06:53 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Andrea & Barrett
